name: lg08
description:
Empirically derived exchangability matrix for general proteins.

This command only refers to the symmetric part of the LG08 model, not the frequencies.  Frequencies are added by using the `+f` command.  Frequencies are estimated by default but can be fixed to the values estimated in the paper using `+f[lg08_freq]`.

citation.title: An Improved General Amino Acid Replacement Matrix
